meanings.definition: A female ruler or queen in India.
meanings.sent1: The maharanees of the ancient kingdom was loved by her people.
meanings.sent2: The maharanees wore a beautiful crown adorned with jewels.
meanings.sent3: The maharanees decided to host a grand feast for all her subjects.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the court was as commanding as a maharanees in her palace.
meanings.sent5: The maharanees' benevolent rule brought prosperity to the land.

meanings.definition: The title of a female member of a royal family in India.
meanings.sent1: The maharanees attended the royal ball in a stunning gown.
meanings.sent2: It was an honor to be in the presence of the maharanees at the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The maharanees' pet parrot mimicked her royal commands.
meanings.sent4: She carried herself with the grace befitting a maharanees of her lineage.
meanings.sent5: The maharanees' portrait hung proudly in the palace gallery.
